sentences.english: We weren't allowed to speak Gaelic at school.
sentences.chinese: 我們在學校不允許講蓋爾語。

sentences.english: I'm really sad I couldn't give a speech in Gaelic.
sentences.chinese: 不能用蓋爾語發表獲獎感言我真是遺憾啊。

sentences.english: Important poet of Scotland, with Gaelic writing.
sentences.chinese: 蘇格蘭重要詩人，用蓋爾語寫作。

sentences.english: Gaelic has been spoken by the people of Scotland for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 蓋爾語在蘇格蘭已經使用了幾世紀了。

sentences.english: There seems to have been some patronage of Gaelic poetry by the later Pictish kings.
sentences.chinese: 這可能是後來的皮克特國王保護了蓋爾語詩歌的緣故。
在蓋爾語中，格呢披肩其實就是“毯子”的意思。
